Related Lung Diseases
What are the treatments for Asbestos-Related Lung Diseases ?,"No treatments can reverse the effects of asbestos on your lungs. However, treatments may help relieve symptoms and prevent or delay complications. If you have lung cancer, treatments may help slow the progress of the disease.
